privacyPolicy.title: Personal Data Protection Policy
privacyPolicy.objectiveDescription: This document aims to establish principles, uniform practices, and responsibilities regarding the processing of personal data carried out by Cytalk.online.
privacyPolicy.scopeDescription: This policy applies to all personal data collected through our online learning platform, including information from students, teachers, and service users. This policy must be known and complied with by all staff and collaborators of Cytalk.online.
privacyPolicy.keyTermsDescription: Cytalk.online: Refers to our online English learning platform and all educational services associated with it.
privacyPolicy.policyDetailDescription: Cytalk.online is committed to complying with the corresponding legislation regarding personal data protection. These regulations fundamentally require us to:
privacyPolicy.policyDetailItem1: The collection and use of personal information.
privacyPolicy.policyDetailItem2: The quality and security of information.
privacyPolicy.policyDetailItem3: The rights of individuals regarding information about themselves.
privacyPolicy.policyDetailConclusion: Cytalk.online is committed to the protection, handling, and appropriate treatment of personal data of our students, teachers, and platform users.
privacyPolicy.complianceResponsibilitiesDescription: The Cytalk.online management team, along with designated staff, will be responsible for periodically reviewing this Policy and making necessary adjustments. Our technical support team will be in charge of resolving any queries related to the application and scope of this Policy.
privacyPolicy.confidentialityDescription: Personal data collected through our platform, including academic and contact information, may not be disclosed without the prior consent of the personal data owner, except for exceptions regulated by Law.
privacyPolicy.principlesDescription: All Cytalk.online staff and collaborators must permanently comply with the following principles established by Law:
privacyPolicy.principleLegality: Legality: The processing of personal data carried out by Cytalk.online will be done in accordance with the Law.
privacyPolicy.principleConsent: Consent: Cytalk.online may not process personal data without the prior, express, unequivocal, and free consent of its owner.
privacyPolicy.principlePurpose: Purpose: Cytalk.online will collect personal data only for educational purposes and improving the learning experience.
privacyPolicy.principleProportionality: Proportionality: All personal data processing carried out by Cytalk.online will be adequate and relevant for the teaching-learning process.
privacyPolicy.principleQuality: Quality: The personal data of our students and teachers will be maintained accurately and up-to-date to ensure an optimal educational experience.
privacyPolicy.principleSecurity: Security: Cytalk.online will implement technical and organizational measures to protect the personal information of our educational community.

cyril.experience: With 9 years of experience teaching English as a foreign language. Her classes are dynamic, with relevant materials and a pleasant environment. She uses a communicative method and interactive digital tools, with personalized learning plans according to student interests and goals. She speaks Spanish (native), English (C1), French (B1) and Italian (A1).
cyril.vision: As the face of cytalk.online, my mission is to inspire and guide students worldwide to achieve their linguistic goals with confidence and success.
cyril.methodology: My approach focuses on effective communication, using interactive and personalized methods for each student. I believe in learning through constant practice and the use of innovative digital resources.

cost.question: How much does the course cost?
cost.answer: Take advantage of our special offer! 50% discount, classes are only S/. 100 S/. 50 per month.

duration.question: Can I take just one month?
duration.answer: Yes, we offer monthly modality. However, we recommend a minimum of 6 months to achieve significant progress in your English.

registration.question: What is the registration process?
registration.answer:
1. Go to the payment form
2. Choose your preferred schedule
3. Make the payment via transfer, Yape or card
4. Follow the instructions and you're ready to start!

requirements.question: What technical requirements do I need?
requirements.answer:
- Computer or laptop with webcam
- Stable internet connection
- Functional microphone
- Zoom installed (we will send you the access link)

courseIncludes.question: What does the course include?
courseIncludes.answer:
- Access to live classes
- Digital materials
- Interactive exercises
- Teacher support
- Periodic evaluations to measure your progress.

level.question: What level of English do I need to start?
level.answer:
- No previous experience needed.
- Upon registration, we help you determine your current level to place you in the appropriate group.
- Start your English journey today!

beginners.title: English Beginners
beginners.description: People with no previous experience, interested in learning English from scratch. Ideal for those looking to develop a solid foundation in the language and want to evolve professionally.

professionals.title: Professionals and Creatives
professionals.description: For experienced professionals looking to refresh their knowledge, change areas, or grow within the same company. You will learn English variants in depth and be prepared to collaborate in international work teams.

entrepreneurs.title: Entrepreneurs and Small Business Owners
entrepreneurs.description: Business owners intending to create successful products to enhance their brand. You will master the skills to offer the best user-centered experiences. You will become a leader in coordinating international projects.

conversation.title: Participate in conversations
conversation.description: Learn to actively participate in English conversations, improving your fluency and confidence.

pronunciation.title: Practice pronunciation
pronunciation.description: Perfect your pronunciation to speak English confidently and be understood by native speakers.

grammar.title: Improve your grammar
grammar.description: Master English grammar rules to communicate with precision and clarity in any situation.

vocabulary.title: Expand your vocabulary
vocabulary.description: Learn new words and expressions to enrich your English communication and comprehension.

reading.title: Develop reading skills
reading.description: Improve your ability to read and understand English texts, from articles to literature.

listening.title: Improve listening comprehension
listening.description: Develop the ability to understand spoken English in different accents and contexts.

examPrep.title: Exam preparation
examPrep.description: Prepare for internationally recognized English exams, such as TOEFL and IELTS.

culture.title: Culture and context
culture.description: Learn about the culture and context of English-speaking countries for more effective communication.

certification.title: International Certification
certification.description: Students who successfully complete the study program will be prepared to take Cambridge's official international recognition tests, opening doors to academic and professional opportunities worldwide.
